import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' function Home() { const [product, setProduct] = useState([]) const [selectedProduct, setSelectedProduct] = useState(null) const base_url = fetch("https://fakestoreapi.com/products") const fetchData = async () => { const result = await fetch(base_url) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((products) => setProduct(products.products)) } console.log("product data", product) useEffect(() => { fetchData() }, []) return ( <>
